CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, January 26, 1946, pg. 1 reads: "Champ and Challenger Meet - Heavyweight Champion Joe Louis and Challenger Billy Conn met Tuesday in Pittsburgh Courier offices to talk about their training plans and prospects for their big $1,000,000 fight in New York June 19. Conn has already opened his preliminary training camp in Hot Springs, while Joe is completing plans for his setup at West Baden, Ind., where he opens drills March 1. - Harris Photo"
TitMainTitle: Boxers Joe Louis and Billy Conn in Pittsburgh Courier office with ship model
